DecompressionStream.summary: The DecompressionStream interface of the decompresses a stream of data. It implements the same shape as a , allowing it to be used in and similar methods.

DecompressionStreamDecompressionStream.summary: The DecompressionStream() constructor creates a new object which decompresses a stream of data.

DecompressionStreamReadable.summary: The readable read-only property of the interface returns a that emits decompressed data as {{jsxref("Uint8Array")}} chunks.

DecompressionStreamWritable.summary: The writable read-only property of the interface returns a that accepts compressed data to be decompressed, in the form of {{jsxref("ArrayBuffer")}}, {{jsxref("TypedArray")}}, or {{jsxref("DataView")}} chunks.
